Package org.apache.jena.ttl

Class N3IRIResolver

java.lang.Object
org.apache.jena.ttl.N3IRIResolver
@Deprecated public class N3IRIResolver extends Object
Deprecated.
A simple class to access IRI resolution. Replaced by org.apache.jena.riot.system.IRIResolver Only exists for jena-core tests

  • Constructor Details

    • N3IRIResolver

      public N3IRIResolver()
      Deprecated.
      Construct an IRIResolver with base as the current working directory.

    • N3IRIResolver

      public N3IRIResolver(String baseS)
      Deprecated.
      Construct an IRIResolver with base determined by the argument URI. If this is relative, it is relative against the current working directory.
      Parameters:
      baseS -
      Throws:
      JenaURIException - If resulting base would not be legal, absolute IRI

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      String The filename as an absolute URL
      Throws:
      IRIException

    • resolve

      public static String resolve(String relStr, String baseStr) throws JenaURIException
      Deprecated.
      Create resolve a URI against a base. If baseStr is a relative file IRI then it is first resolved against the current working directory.
      Parameters:
      relStr -
      baseStr - Can be null if relStr is absolute
      Returns:
      String An absolute URI
      Throws:
      JenaURIException - If result would not be legal, absolute IRI
